column1: 10 pts - Great job identifying the business function that could benefit from scrum/sprint methodologies and explaining why. Keep up the good work!

12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how scrum/sprint could operate. Great job explaining the benefits of implementing scrum/sprint for producing 2D renderings of new product ideas. Keep up the good work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit

Comment: Good attempt at explaining why kanban is not the best fit for the function, but could be more specific and clear in your explanation. Keep up the good work!
10 pts - Great job identifying the business function that could benefit from kanban. Your explanation of how kanban could operate for this function is clear and well-organized. Keep up the good work!

8 pts - Missing significant explanatory content. 

Your response provided some insights into why kanban might not be suitable for certain functions, but it lacked a clear and specific explanation of how kanban could operate for the chosen function. Please provide more details on the possible columns in the kanban board and how it could be implemented.

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt at explaining why scrum/sprint is not the best fit for the function, but could be more specific and clear in your explanation. Keep up the good work!

5 pts - Selected bias is clearly relevant to this situation.

Great job identifying negativity bias as a potential issue in decision-making. Keep up the good work!

10 pts - Complete and correct definition

Great job defining negativity bias and providing suggestions to avoid it in decision-making. Keep up the good work!

8 pts - Significant shortfall in description

Your response has some good points, but it lacks a clear and detailed description of the possible problem. Try to focus more on the specific aspects of the issue and provide a more comprehensive explanation.

8 pts - Reasonable description, but missing some detail. 

Great effort in providing explanations for the different functions and their suitability for Kanban methodology. However, the response could be more focused on specific steps or actions to implement the method. Keep up the good work!
